Title: Establishes "Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution"
Summary: Establishes January 30th of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing January thirtieth of each year as a day of commemoration known as "Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution"
